name: La Vie Moderne de SEQUEL
description:
An entry for Mean Girls Games' Oktrollberfest 2021 Game Jam.

You wanted it!

You asked for it!

And this time

We're fucking BRINGING it!

velkomme to the City of ZZT, the second worst place in the Lands of the Worlds of ZZT. (First worst is, of course, Staten Island.) Your mission, should you choose to accept it, and if you don't, you might as well go play *Winter* or *Town of ZZT Remix* or *Cyber Purge* or *Mutant Citadel* or some other better ZZT game, is to get out of the City! 

All you need to do is get on the train. After all that stupidity you went through last year, how much worse could it get?

---

HOW TO PLAY

Use the arrow keys to move around. Hold Shift and press an arrow key to shoot (if you are able to.) Press T to light a torch (if it is dark.) Touch an object to interact with it.

Have fun!

---

MORE ZZT GOODNESS

If you head to the Museum of ZZT there's more ZZT games there! A *lot* more! Thirty years' worth of 16-color EGA text mode glory and delight!

---

VERSION 1.01 UPLOADED 10/29/21 - Several bugfixes made. This is what you get when you play each board in isolation instead of playtesting it from start to finish!
